listitem.simpara: The UMC policy "default-umc-users" gets appended to the "Domain Users $SCHOOL" group when creating a new school. This allows users to change their own password via UMC (Bug 36537).
The hyphen (-) character can be used in hostnames of schools (Bug 36034).
The S4-Connector now synchronizes the ntSecurityDescriptor of groupPolicyContainer objects (Bug 37350).

During Installation of UCS@school on a UCS DC Slave, the &ucsUCRV; connector/ldap/binddn is now set explicitly to the value of ldap/hostdn. This avoids problems in cases where Samba/AD serivces had been installed on the Slave before installing UCS@school (Bug 35248).
Error handling in various modules have been improoved. Errors could happen in case of missing objects due to deletion or missing replication (Bug 34970), (Bug 37668).
Design adaption regarding the new UCS 4.0 UMC design have been done in various UMC modules (Bug 36796), (Bug 36760), (Bug 36479).

To prevent problems with usernames that are too long for windows, the CSV import module restricts the length of usernames (with default settings the limit is 15 characters).Overlong usernames will be highlighted with a red cell background (Bug 37154).

Whitespace characters in the birthday column of CSV files could lead to error messages or highlighted red cells during the CSV import. The CSV import module now removes whitespace characters automatically from birthday column's values. (Bug 37155, Bug 37776).
Improoved error handling in case the module process dies between uploading and importing of CSV files (Bug 36922).
To prevent problems with usernames that are too long for windows, the UMC module Users (schools) restricts the length of usernames (with default settings the limit is 15 characters). (Bug 37154).
DNS timeouts will not prevent opening the UCS@school configuration module anymore (Bug 37763).
A segmentation fault in the libqjpeg library is now prevented when receiving screenshot information (Bug 37269).
The end time of computerroom settings is displayed in red again (Bug 36828).
Various text changes have been done (Bug 36849, Bug 36848).
Uploading files with umlauts in their name has been fixed (Bug 36846).
